pageContext.claim: “I was at Mt. Rushmore. They want to blow a Mt. Rushmore up. I said to our great governor of South Dakota, Christie. I said, this has never happened in Christie. Don't worry about it, she said you don't have to. We don't even need your help or this one. It was so beautiful, Mt. Rushmore. They want to blow it up.”
pageContext.analysis: False. The claim that Democrats want to tear down Mount Rushmore is just a rumor promoted by talk radio personality Ben Shapiro.
